>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.On2ZrPJTe8FURsXY]{Operative Exploit}

When you hit an enemy with a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.MBNI94tbMoqizPUk]{trick attack}, you can forgo your trick attack damage to increase the duration of the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.bhSrjkuWxz2DQHXC]{debilitating trick} effect by 1 round. If you have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.jd4qWJS9qElePrhf]{double debilitation} ability, the duration of both debilitating tricks increases. Debilitating tricks with no duration (such as @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.OAVc1W07QUCBNS94]{Bleeding Shot (Ex)} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.A0tENDv2mzEBfhe0]{Knee Shot (Ex)}) are unaffected.
